name: What Is Sleeping In My Room?
name_original: What Is Sleeping In My Room?
description:
This short Visual Novel experience will have you explore the different areas of your home on a search for the Monster. But the Monster will force you to make choices you didn't want to make.

What is the right choice? Will you figure it out?

  • Different endings depend on your decisions
  • Interactive gameplay moments to make it more then a book
  • Unique cutscenes to make each playthrough a little bit different
  • Over 50+ songs to enhance the story and mood
